title: Garden Cottage
posting_body: Spacious one bedroom garden cottage on quiet, private lane.
Up-graded kitchen with gas stove, refrigerator, dishwasher and optional microwave,
lots of counter, cupboard space and drawers.
Large bathroom with big stall shower and large storage closet.
Big, vaulted ceiling bedroom with lots of light, double walk-in closets.
Living room has paneled ceiling, gas-log fireplace and leaded glass windows.
Shaded patio under wisteria arbor ringed with potted plants.
Perfect for someone needing a relaxing retreat in a desired location close to S.V. and Stanford.
Close to Windy Hill Open Space Preserve and miles of public trails.
5 minutes to I-280, 10 minutes to Stanford/Palo Alto.
Local shopping ½ mile away.
Situated midway between SFO and SJC airports (35 minutes)
Shared laundry facilities and utilities.
On-site gardener and maintenance.
Parking for one car only (no on-street parking is available).
No pets.
No tobacco products.
Security deposit $3,500.
Credit check, references required.
This is a unique rental opportunity in central Portola Valley.

Built in the 1930’s as a week-end get-a-way adjacent to Corte Madera Creek with lush informal gardens and a backdrop of redwood trees, it is ideal as a quiet place to relax and enjoy nature after a high performance work day.
Resident landlords (2) and a professional couple share property in separate cottages.
COVID Vac’s required.
Please write the word cozy in the subject line for the courtesy of a reply.
This cottage has undergone substantial renovations over the past few years while maintaining its country cottage charm.
Reply to Richard to arrange a viewing and interview.
